QuestData.Title: Crushing the Wildhammer
QuestData.Description: The Wildhammer grow bold with their new Alliance allies. They dare press across the river. Drive them back!$B$BSeek out and crush the Wildhammer warbrands who fight in the riverbed and within the Thundermar Ruins along the north bank. The best among them carry insignias - gather them for me to prove your allegiance to the Dragonmaw cause.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Wildhammer Warbrands to collect 8 Wildhammer Insignias. Named characters within the Thundermar Ruins will also carry insignias.
QuestData.CompletionText: Show me the insignias you've collected, $c.
